devices_included: Phone; Desktop computer; Laptop; TV; in-car entertainment; Tablet
contribution_desc:
A web-based middleware for supporting application execution and personal data access in multi-device vehicles, for example exporting travel itinerary from the smartphone to the in-car navigation system. One of the key features of the middleware is the separation between the personal data and the applications. This paper is not about interactions but still proposes a relevant architecture for cross-device computing, moving forward from individual devices to systems (vehicles), so I have tagged this paper a "2".

Contribution: "cross-device" -> "toolkit, middleware" -> "application and data distribution" -> "in-vehicle systems"
connection_classification: Local master device; Via remote server
